Control Name: Assess Changes in Systems and Technology—The risk identification process considers changes arising from changes in the entity’s systems and changes in the technology environment.

control_attributes.Control: Assess Changes in Systems and Technology—The risk identification process considers changes arising from changes in the entity’s systems and changes in the technology environment.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC3.4 COSO Principle 9: The entity identifies and assesses changes that could significantly impact the system of internal control.
